title: Project Blue Book - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/23/20
itunes:title: Project Blue Book - Best of Coast to Coast AM - 1/23/20
description:
George Noory and Paul Hynek, the son of famous UFO investigator J. Allen Hynek, explores his father's work with the Navy's Project Blue Book that tried to cover up UFO reports, and how he became convinced some sightings were real.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
content:encoded:
George Noory and Paul Hynek, the son of famous UFO investigator J. Allen Hynek, explores his father's work with the Navy's Project Blue Book that tried to cover up UFO reports, and how he became convinced some sightings were real.

itunes:summary: The son of a famous Navy investigator discusses his journey from UFO skeptic to believer.
